name: Current_CE
description:
This will be our first Ludum Dare Game Jam launch!

Ludum Dare Theme: "Life is Currency"

With some random Google searches and a stroke of creative luck 44's theme turned us to the saying of "Dead Batteries Bounce".  The more energy you have the safer you are from death...but to bounce over hazards you'll need to spend some electric current...cy

Get to the goal with as much energy in your battery as possible…because in this game your life IS currency!
